UniprotID	Q03113
Accession	Q03113;A4D204;B3KXS2;B7Z3F7;Q2T9L1;Q5PPR5;Q86UM8;Q8TD71;Q9UDU9
EntryName	GNA12_HUMAN
ProteinName	Guanine nucleotide-binding protein subunit alpha-12 (G alpha-12) (G-protein subunit alpha-12)
GeneName	GNA12
Length	381
Function	Guanine nucleotide-binding proteins (G proteins) are involved as modulators or transducers in various transmembrane signaling systems (PubMed:12515866, PubMed:15240885, PubMed:15525651, PubMed:16705036, PubMed:16787920, PubMed:17565996, PubMed:22609986, PubMed:23762476, PubMed:27084452). Activates effector molecule RhoA by binding and activating RhoGEFs (ARHGEF12/LARG) (PubMed:12515866, PubMed:15240885, PubMed:16202387). GNA12-dependent Rho signaling subsequently regulates transcription factor AP-1 (activating protein-1) (By similarity). GNA12-dependent Rho signaling also regulates protein phosphatese 2A activation causing dephosphorylation of its target proteins (PubMed:15525651, PubMed:17565996). Promotes tumor cell invasion and metastasis by activating RhoA/ROCK signaling pathway and up-regulating pro-inflammatory cytokine production (PubMed:16705036, PubMed:16787920, PubMed:23762476, PubMed:27084452). Inhibits CDH1-mediated cell adhesion in process independent from Rho activation (PubMed:11976333, PubMed:16787920). Together with NAPA promotes CDH5 localization to plasma membrane (PubMed:15980433). May play a role in the control of cell migration through the TOR signaling cascade (PubMed:22609986).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Lateral cell membrane; Cytoplasm
Disorder	0.2258,0.1424,0.0888,0.1643,0.1643,0.2002,0.1969,0.2258,0.2575,0.2541,0.2752,0.2988,0.2918,0.2884,0.3215,0.3840,0.3910,0.3807,0.4409,0.4369,0.4409,0.4685,0.5665,0.6755,0.6322,0.6322,0.6227,0.6620,0.6531,0.6531,0.6851,0.6948,0.5665,0.5758,0.5493,0.4901,0.4087,0.3807,0.3774,0.4087,0.4119,0.4087,0.4087,0.3356,0.3356,0.3249,0.2715,0.2094,0.2129,0.1424,0.0909,0.0555,0.0320,0.0555,0.0454,0.0543,0.0929,0.1449,0.1671,0.1731,0.1643,0.1759,0.1007,0.0719,0.1092,0.1184,0.1007,0.1554,0.1399,0.0851,0.1476,0.2193,0.2951,0.3872,0.2783,0.3087,0.3182,0.3117,0.2849,0.2002,0.1298,0.1349,0.0676,0.1229,0.1942,0.2002,0.1206,0.0749,0.0780,0.1399,0.1399,0.0817,0.0817,0.0835,0.0780,0.1424,0.0967,0.0531,0.0341,0.0414,0.0592,0.0967,0.0967,0.1759,0.1137,0.1115,0.0618,0.1298,0.1275,0.1349,0.0734,0.1229,0.1942,0.2094,0.2164,0.2164,0.2258,0.2951,0.3460,0.2988,0.2064,0.2034,0.1823,0.0948,0.0985,0.1702,0.1702,0.2193,0.1914,0.2064,0.2224,0.2364,0.2470,0.2715,0.2224,0.2193,0.1229,0.1275,0.0719,0.0483,0.0618,0.1275,0.1275,0.0870,0.1583,0.1298,0.0676,0.0334,0.0405,0.0424,0.0734,0.0605,0.0555,0.0518,0.0454,0.0454,0.0218,0.0433,0.0405,0.0719,0.1251,0.1942,0.0851,0.1115,0.1137,0.1184,0.1501,0.2292,0.2645,0.2609,0.1643,0.0909,0.0506,0.0948,0.1028,0.0531,0.0676,0.1323,0.0780,0.0799,0.0851,0.0483,0.0494,0.0568,0.0248,0.0531,0.0506,0.0463,0.0506,0.0835,0.0463,0.0463,0.0531,0.0749,0.0704,0.0631,0.0909,0.0909,0.0909,0.1528,0.0888,0.0531,0.1028,0.0948,0.1671,0.1671,0.0929,0.0543,0.0543,0.0494,0.0263,0.0592,0.0494,0.0888,0.0851,0.0531,0.0568,0.0424,0.0414,0.0424,0.0454,0.0799,0.1229,0.1206,0.1206,0.1206,0.2164,0.1823,0.1583,0.1671,0.1206,0.1028,0.0870,0.1731,0.1070,0.1373,0.1969,0.1206,0.1115,0.0531,0.0414,0.0248,0.0244,0.0244,0.0231,0.0240,0.0143,0.0146,0.0281,0.0389,0.0214,0.0253,0.0555,0.0543,0.0543,0.0967,0.0948,0.1070,0.1759,0.1731,0.2164,0.2575,0.3249,0.2918,0.3117,0.2292,0.1229,0.2002,0.2034,0.1229,0.1206,0.2034,0.2541,0.2470,0.1611,0.0835,0.0398,0.0424,0.0244,0.0235,0.0240,0.0223,0.0133,0.0084,0.0
